name: cloudflare-to-apache
description: Script to convert Cloudflare log format to Apache log format

scripts.test: node index < test/input.log > test/output.log && if [[ -n $(diff test/output.log test/correct-output.log) ]]; then echo 'Fail'; exit 1; else echo 'Pass'; exit 0; fi;

author: Lloyd Watkin <lloyd.watkin@surevine.com>
